480: Oh, it's just a dream, I feel I met a lot in the dream, but it's just happened for 1 second in the real life…
果然刚才的是一场梦么，总感觉过了很长一段时间，但现实中却不过是一瞬……
Was it really just a dream? It felt like a long time had passed, but in reality it was only a moment...
果然美好的东西总是虚幻的呢……
As expected, beautiful things are always fleeting...
Mei… What happened ? I really want to know.
芽衣你又在皱眉头了！果然刚才发生了什么事对吧？
Mei, you're frowning again! That must mean something happened just now, right?
不是那么重要的事啦，只是…稍微在想一些问题而已。
It's not that important, I'm just... thinking about some things.
What happened? Kiana, stop looking at me like that.
怎…怎么了？琪亚娜，这么盯着我看。
What... what's wrong? Kiana, why are you staring at me like that?
Although I know there's something Mei doesn't want to tell me, howevet, nevermind. Mei, be positive.
虽然知道芽衣有什么在瞒着我，但是如果芽衣不想告诉我的话就算啦。但是芽衣，情感这种东西，无论是积极的还是消极的都不能在心中积压太久哦~
I know you're is hiding something from me, Mei, but if you don't want to tell me, then that's okay. But Mei, emotions, whether positive or negative, shouldn't be kept inside for too long.
I'm always open to you, you can tell me everything you want.
所以如果你想找个人倾诉的话，就告诉我吧，我会认真听着的！
So if you need someone to talk to, just talk to me and I'll listen!
You must read those words from other books. It's not like what you would say.
刚才那句话肯定是从那本书上照抄过来的吧？这可不像琪亚娜会说的话呢。
That sentence must have been copied from that book, right? It doesn't sound like something you would normally say, Kiana.
481: There are not many changes here, just like the old times.
这里和以前来的时候一样，没什么变化呢。
It's the same here as it was before, not much has changed.
We haven't left here for a long time too~
毕竟离开长空市的时间也不长嘛，这里当然不会有什么变化啦~
Well, it hasn't been long since we escaped Nagazora, so of course nothing here has changed.
When I was a kid, my fathere took me to this place…
依稀记得在很小的时候，父亲大人曾经带我来过这里……
I vaguely remember that my father brought me here when I was very young...
However, when I grew up, he never took me to this place again.
但是从那之后父亲大人再也没有带我来参拜过。
But after that, my father never brought me to visit this shrine again.
That's it, you choose this place to pray and then you missed your father.
原来是这样，所以你才选择来这里参拜，然后就想你爸爸了对吧。
So that's why you chose to come here to pray. Because you missed your father, right?
Otherwise, you won't shot like that: "Father!" Yeah, that must be the reason.
要不然你也不会突然喊出“父亲大人”这种话了，嗯！一定是这样的！
Otherwise, you wouldn't have suddenly called out "Father." Yeah! That must be the case!
… You are right… At some points… However, your words makes me feel strange.
……这么说是没错啦，不过为什么感觉这话说得那么奇怪呢？
...That's true, but why does it sound so strange?
Don't care too much about the details…
不过你说的可能是对的呢。
也许，我真的在想念他吧……
Maybe I just really miss him...
482: 目标人物发现。正在发送人物报告。
Bronya? Are you trying to find us?
布洛妮娅？你是来找我们的么？
Bronya? Are you here to find us?
Just detected some Houkai energy here, Himeko asked me to check it out and find you.
刚才检测到这个区域有轻微的崩坏能的波动，姬子少校让我前来调查，顺便来找你们。
I only detected a slight fluctuation of Honkai Energy in this area. Major Himeko asked me to come and investigate, and I noticed you were here also.
Oh, seems we have no time to pray.
偷懒被发现了呢，看来今天是没法再参拜了呢。
We've been spotted slacking off. Seems I can’t visit the shrine today.
Kiana, let's go. We will have another time to pray.
琪亚娜，我们回去吧，有机会的话再到这里来参拜就是了。
Kiana, let's go back. We can come here to pay our respects again when we have the chance.
It's hard for me to stay with Mei alone, and this palce is full of your memories.
好不容易才能跟芽衣单独相处，而且这里也是芽衣充满回忆的地方。
It's so hard to be alone with Mei, and this is also a place full of memories for you.
就不能让我们参拜完吗？
Can't we just finish paying respects?
Stop it, Kiana. I won't let you take Mei away.
琪亚娜你不要再说了。我是不会让你把芽衣姐姐带走的。
Kiana, enough talking. I won't let you take Mei away.
Looks like I'll have to force it then!
483: Self checking… Energy: 87%, Armored Bunny 19C: 78% HP…
自我检测中……能源消耗13%，重装小兔受损程度22%，其余功能状态良好。
Self-examination in progress... Energy consumption: 13%. Damage to Armored Bunny: 22%. All other functions in good condition.
Great, you are fine… Kiana, you are so impulsive!
没事就好…琪亚娜你为什么这么冲动？
I'm glad you're okay... Kiana, why are you so impulsive?
She tried stop you. That's the place full of your memories, but…
但是她不是拦着芽衣不让你去参拜吗？明明是充满着过去的回忆的地方，但是……
But didn't she prevent you from visiting, Mei? It's clearly a place filled with your memories, but...
You shouldn't do that… She is our sister.
那也不能把枪口指向她啊，布洛妮娅可是我们的同伴啊。
But you can't point a gun at her, Bronya is our comrade.
Great, you are fine… Kiana, you are so impulsive!
Although memories is very precious, however, in this Houkai world, friendship is also very valuable.
回忆虽然是很可贵的东西，但是在这不断被崩坏侵蚀的世界中，在患难中共同进退的友情才是更可贵的！
Memories are precious, but in this world that is constantly threatened by the Honkai, friendship that stands together through thick and thin is even more precious!
After you joined our team, we treated you as our friend, teammate. Do you know that, Kiana?
尤其是在你们已经加入了我的小队之后，朋友也好，战友也好，这份情谊才是维持我们这个小队和谐的重要因素！琪亚娜，你知道了吗？
Especially now that you've joined my squad, whether as friends or comrades, companionship is the most important factor in maintaining harmony in our squad! Kiana, do you understand?
You got it, just go to the shrine and pray now.
知道了就好，那么我们就去参拜吧。
That's good to know. Now let's go and pay our respects.
Himeko, you are not taking us back?
姬子少校你不是来带我们回去的吗？
Major Himeko, aren't you here to take us back?
I just wanted to check the Houkai energy here and I found there is nothing here. So, you can pray in the shrine.
本来我是探测到这里有崩坏能的波动反应，又发现你们不在，才让布洛妮娅过来看看。不过现在看来这里什么事都没发生的样子，那为什么我不能体谅一下我的部下呢？

Originally, I detected a Houkai Energy fluctuation here, and when I realized you weren't with us, I sent Bronya over to check. But now it seems like nothing's wrong here, so why can't I be more considerate of my subordinates?
Do it fast, Theresa is waiting us.
快走吧，学园长还在前面等着呢。
Let's go quickly, the principal is still waiting for us.
484: Theresa, don't act just like a kid.
学园长，请不要总像个小孩子一样玩心这么重。
Principal, enough acting all childish and goofing off.
No… I did my job very well!
哪…哪里玩了，我可是有好好调查的好不好！
What... What do you mean "goofing off"? I have done a thorough investigation, alright?
*Cough* I already knew who made the Houkai energy here! It's you!
咳咳……这一次在这里发生的小型崩坏反应我已经知道是谁引起的了！凶手就是你！
Ahem... I already know who caused this minor Honkai reaction here! The culprit is you!
喂！大姨妈，你干嘛指着芽衣啊。
Hey! Auntie, why are you pointing at Mei?
Yes, it's you. It may effect in dream or something like that…
虽然这么说可能不准确，但的确是你——雷电芽衣引起了这地方的一些变故，具体的表现形式可能是幻境、梦境之类的，但是我却找不到发生此类现象的痕迹。

Although this may not be accurate, it is true that you, Raiden Mei, affected this place in some way. The specific manifestations may be illusions, dreams, etc., but I can't find any trace of such phenomena.
An illusion... huh, so that's how it is.
看来你似乎有一些头绪了？
It seems like you have an idea?
I just saw my father, 8-year-old me and Hokushin Mei…
就在刚才，我看见了我的父亲，还有小时候的我，还有之前曾经遇到过的“北辰一刀流”的创始人，还有两位除妖师小姐……
Just now, I saw my father, myself as a child, the founder of the "Hokushin Ittou-ryuu" sword art whom I had met before, and two young demon hunters...
Oh, they should not appear here…
因为确实太过不可思议，而且出现的都是不可能出现在现世的人物……
It's truly too unbelievable — it's impossible for those people to appear in this time and space...
Maybe you miss someone so much.
不过结合学园长的推测，我想可能是因为某种名为“思念”的感情而引发的吧。
However, combined with your speculation, Principal, I think it might be caused by some kind of emotion called "missing".
Yes, it must be "Miss", we find the reason!
强烈的情感波动的确是崩坏能波动的原因之一，那么这一次小规模崩坏的调查就此告终！
Strong emotional fluctuations are indeed one of the reasons for the fluctuation of Honkai Energy, so this small-scale investigation into Honkai Energy can now end here!
Let's go back to St. Freya HS now. Alright, before we go, we…
回到圣芙蕾雅之后芽衣你再去做个身体检测吧。不过现在……
Mei, you should get a physical examination after returning to St. Freyja. But for now...
就按照你们原定的计划，一起去参拜吧~
Let's go to the shrine together just like you planned~
485: Errrr. I think you just drop away your jobs…
所以说，真的不是因为学园长自己想要偷懒吗？
So, it’s really not because you just want to slack off, Principal?
No, I really want to pray here!
才没有！我可是带着十足的诚意来许愿的！
No way! I made this wish with all my heart!
Grow up, is that your wish?
哦？反正又是什么想让自己长大之类的不切实际的愿望吧。
Oh? I bet it's just some unrealistic wish like wanting to grow up.
Humph, your wish must be related to love.
哼！那你呢，肯定又许了跟恋爱相关的愿望了吧。
Hmph! What about you? You must have made another love-related wish.
Your wish is "Find a boyfriend" every year, however, you never find one.
每年都在求神拜佛保佑自己找个男朋友，结果不还是这个样子。
Every year, you wish for God to bless you and find a boyfriend, but the results are always the same.
Theresa master, you shouldn't say that to Himeko.
学园长，你怎么能这样说姬子少校呢？是不是有点过分了？
Principal, how could you say that about Major Himeko? Isn't that a bit too much?
I think she said bad words about me first!
为什么说我啊！明明是她先嘲讽我长不大的好不好！
Why are you blaming me? She was the one who mocked me for not growing up first!
Theresa, I think you are popular in our school~
但是大姨妈你平时不是经常穿着修女服在学校晃荡吗？好像还很受欢迎的样子！
But Auntie, don't you often hang around school in a nun's uniform? You seem to be quite popular!
However, you can see Himeko, as a girl, she is not so popular…
但是你看姬子少校，身为一个女孩子，不受欢迎也就算了……
But look at Major Himeko, as a girl, not being popular is one thing but... (TN: idk how to make this sound more natural)
And she always has a lot of missions.
还经常被指派各种各样的任务，共计317个。
She's also frequently assigned various tasks, totaling 317.
I know you are trying to help me, but you should not say those things…
虽然我知道你们在帮我说话，但是好歹给我留一点面子吧……
Although I know you are speaking for me, please at least give me some face...
Well, well, well, you are all helping this oppai monster…
很好，很好，你们今天居然都在帮这个欧派妖怪说话……
Very good, very good, you are all speaking up for this oppai monster today...
I think I must use Judah to give you a lesson!
看来得用犹大的誓约教会你们如何尊师敬长了！
Looks like I need to use the Oath of Judas to teach you how to respect your teachers and elders!
486: 呼——久违的活动筋骨，真是让人浑身舒畅啊~
Phew— It’s been a long time since I last stretched my muscles. I feel a lot more at ease now~
Humph! Your weapon is better than us!
哼！就仗着自己有一把好武器。
Hmph! It's only because you have a better weapon.
可恶！居然还是打不过她！
Damn it! I still can’t beat her!
想打过我？你们还是太嫩了啊！我当初可是留了很多力的~
Beat me? You're still too inexperienced! I was holding back a lot of my strength, y'know~
Alright, stop that. Don't fight in front of the shrine~
好啦好啦，这些东西就不要纠结了，在人家神社面前打打杀杀多不好~
Alright, alright, no need to dwell on it. It's not nice to fight and kill in front of someone's shrine~
Stop… I think Theresa has a good mood mow, stop talking.
嘘……学园长现在心情貌似很不错的样子，还是不要自找麻烦了。
Shh... The principal seems to be in a good mood right now, so it's better not to cause any trouble.
Kiana, Bronya, let's go to pray.
琪亚娜，布洛妮娅，我们去参拜吧。
Kiana, Bronya, let's go to the shrine.
Fine, you are lucky this time.
算了，不跟那个小鬼头一般见识。
Forget it, I won’t bother with that little brat.
This place looks just like ruin. However, we still have chances to make our wishes come true. Let's go to pray… Wait me!
就算这个地方已经破败了，没有神明，但是祈愿什么的总还是会有可能成功的嘛！所以我们还是去参拜……人呢？喂！你们等等我！！
Even though this place is dilapidated and devoid of deities, there's still a chance that our wishes will come true! So let's go pay our respects anyway... Wait, where'd they go? Hey! Wait for me!
琪亚娜，你刚才没有认真参拜吧？
Kiana, you didn't pay your respects seriously just now, did you?
Oh no, I just focus on Mei, forgot to make a wish!
糟了，刚才光顾着偷看芽衣，忘记许愿了！
Oh no, I was so busy peeking at Mei that I forgot to make a wish!
Errrr, yeah I made a wish~
没…没有啊，我可是好好按照芽衣你说的做了哦~
N-...No, I did exactly as you said, Mei~
She is lying, she was watching you.
琪亚娜在说谎，她刚才是在偷偷看芽衣姐姐。
Kiana is lying. She was secretly looking at Mei just now.
Humph? How do you know that?
嗯？那布洛妮娅你又是怎么知道的呢？
Hmm? And how do you know that, Bronya?
Mei is important to me, I wish her happy forever~
因为芽衣姐姐是我重要的人，布洛妮娅希望芽衣姐姐能够幸福。
Because Mei is such an important person, Bronya wishes that Mei will be happy.
I want to make another one!
好狡猾！我也要重新许愿！
So cunning! I want to make a new wish too!
I want to marry her! I want to live with Mei forever! I want to…
我要和芽衣结婚！我要和芽衣永远在一起！我要和芽衣幸福的生活！我要……
I wish to marry Mei! I wish to be with Mei forever! I wish to live a happy life with Mei! I wish...
Enough! Don't say those embarrassed things~
行啦行啦，这么害羞的事不要这么大声的说出来啊！而且这么多愿望神明是会觉得厌烦的啦~
Okay, okay, don't say such embarrassing things out loud! Besides, the gods will get annoyed with so many wishes~
It is really good to be young.
See, you always envy others and do nothing, how dreams come true?
你看，你总是羡慕别人，又不自己行动，愿望怎么会实现嘛！
You see, if you always envy others but don’t take action yourself, how can your wishes come true?
Fine, I don't want to stay here. I think I can beat 100 zombies girls now.
走啦走啦，别在这继续当电灯泡了，还是找点儿活干啊。刚才打了一场，现在感觉可以一口气干掉一百只崩坏兽呢！
C'mon, let's stop being third wheels and find something to do. I just fought a battle, and now I feel like I could kill a hundred Honkai Beasts in one go!
Don’t give me that flat, half-assed line reading!!
487: 琪亚娜，你在偷偷摸摸地干嘛呢？
Kiana, what are you sneaking around for?
呜哇~芽衣学姐小声点~我正在执行伏击任务呢~
Whoa~ Mei-senpai, keep your voice down~ I'm on an ambush mission~
哼哼哼~春节终于到了，可以安心休息一会了！哇咔咔！终于可以放松下来啦！
Hehehe~ Lunar New Year is finally here, I can finally relax and unwind for a while! Wow! I can finally relax!
呃！是谁！我不是大伟哥！我只是路过的吃瓜群众！大过年的不要动粗！爆率什么的我也不知道！
Ah! Who is it?! I'm not Dawei! I'm just a passerby! Don't get violent during Lunar New Year! I don't know anything about the drop rates!
大伟哥你在说什么呀~是我啊！
Dawei, what are you talking about~? It’s me!
呃！原来琪亚娜么和芽衣么？吓我一跳……
Ah! So it's just Kiana and Mei? I was so scared...
嘿嘿~大伟哥，春节快乐啦！
Hehe~ President Dawei, Happy Lunar New Year!
鸡年大吉~新的一年也请加油哦~
Happy Year of the Rooster~ Good luck in the new year~
咳咳！嗯，你们也辛苦了！春节快乐~祝你们在对抗崩坏的战斗中取得卓越的胜利，再见！
Ahem! Well, you've all worked hard! Happy Lunar New Year! I wish you all an outstanding victory in the battle against the Honkai. Goodbye!
喂~大伟哥等下啦~你是不是忘了什么呢~
Hey~ Dawei, wait a minute~ Did you forget something~?
这么说的话的确有这样的习俗呢~太好了，这样就可以换一套新的衣服了~
If that's the case, then there really is such a custom here~ That's great! Then I can finally get a new outfit to wear~
啊啊……红包啊，我知道了，你们等下……啊！快看！那边刷新了一只阿尼拉！
Ahhh... red envelope, I see, just wait a minute... Ah! Look! An Anila has spawned over there!
阿尼拉？活动不是早结束了么……呃！大伟哥！你要去哪！
Anila? Didn't that event end a while ago... Ah! Dawei! Where are you going?!
可恶！别想跑！不给红包就别怪我不客气了！
Damn it! Don’t even think about running away! Don’t blame me for being rude if you don’t give me a red envelope!
488: 啧！大伟哥到底跑哪里去了！
Tch! Where the hell did Dawei go?!
这不是琪亚娜么~居然能在米和油本社看到你，真是稀奇呢~难道你也是来帮忙的么？
If it isn't Kiana~? It's so strange to see you at the miHoYo Headquarters~ Are you here to help too?
你不知道么，最近流出了一段拜年视频，策划们争相作死嘲讽，但是现在却慌得不行，所以让我来保护她们回家过年~

Don't you know? A New Year's greeting video was recently leaked, and the players rushed to mock it. But now the developers are panicking, so they have to be protected so they can go home for the New Year~
这样啊~有什么好处么~嘿嘿！
据说可以在崩坏世界中得到被动的加强哦~
It is said that you can get passive enhancement in Honkai Gakuen~
加强！我那个没用的“主角光环”终于可以有实质性的改变了么！带上我！
Enhancement! My useless "Protagonist Halo" can finally have some substantial changes! Take me with you!
没错~门口的玩家已经排到地铁站了，我们的任务就是保护策划顺利走到地铁口~
That's right~ The players at the door have lined up all the way to the subway station. Our mission is to protect the developers so that they can walk to the subway entrance smoothly~
呃！这…这样啊…我，我想起一件事情！我还得找大伟哥要红包呢！那个，这次就帮不上忙啦~
Uhh! So... so it's... I-I just remembered! I still need to find Dawei to ask for a red envelope! Um, I can't help you this time~
好啦~好啦~既然来了就不要推辞了，等回头我们加强了一起去找大伟哥要红包吧！
Okay, okay~ Now that you’re here, don’t refuse. Once we finish this, let’s go ask President Dawei for a red envelope together!
不要！放开我！我不想要加强啊！！
No! Let me go! I don’t want any enhancements!!
489: 大伟哥不知道跑到哪里去了呢~嘛，算了，反正我只是出来找布洛妮娅的，那个孩子到底跑到哪里去了……
I wonder where Dawei ran off to~ Well, forget it, I just came here to look for Bronya anyway. Where did she go...?
这个需求这样实现可以么，我在代码上面稍微加入了一些自己的想法……
Is this requirement achievable? I added some of my own ideas to the code...
这个是布洛妮娅的声音，唔…她在这里干什么呢？
That's Bronya's voice. Hmm... what is she doing here?
啊……这个报错是因为这行代码的逻辑出了问题，只要把这里换成这个就行了……
Ah... this error is because there is a problem with the logic of this line of code. Just replace it with this...
好像在和本社的社员一起呢……
Seems like she's with the employees of the company...
唔，芽衣姐姐，你怎么来了？
Uhh, Mei, why are you here?
布洛妮娅才是，一声不响地出门了，我担心你才出来找你的哦~
You went out without a word, Bronya. I was worried about you, so I came looking for you.
对不起…因为大伟哥说米和油春节放假前开发忙的来不及了，所以让我过来帮忙，但是怕芽衣姐姐不允许，所以才偷偷出来的……
I'm sorry... Dawei said he was too busy working at miHoYo before the Lunar New Year, so he asked me to come over and help. But I was afraid you wouldn't allow it, Mei, so I sneaked out...
嚯嚯…原来是大伟哥么，看来的确得和他商量一下过年的红包问题了呢~
Ohh... so it was Dawei all along. Looks like I really need to discuss the Lunar New Year red envelope issue with him~
芽衣姐姐，不要生气，布洛妮娅是自愿的……
Mei, don't be angry, Bronya volunteered...
芽衣姐姐总是说琪亚娜花钱太多了，春节都没发过了…所以布洛妮娅才想出来赚一些外快。
Mei, you always say Kiana spends too much money and doesn't have any left for Lunar New Year... so Bronya wanted to make some extra money.
布洛妮娅……呜呜…实在是太懂事了！让我抱抱！
Bronya... aww... you're so sensible! Let me hug you!
呜呜~而且这里的大哥哥都很友好，虽然春节还要加班，但是都乐观地对待着自己的生命，就算生活十分的灰暗，还是坚强地写着代码，布洛妮娅以后也好成为和他们一样坚强的人。

Mm~ And the employees here are very friendly. Although they have to work overtime during Lunar New Year, they are all optimistic about their lives. Even if their lives are very bleak, they still write the code bravely. Bronya wants to become a strong person like them in the future.
呃……嗯…这个理想对布洛妮娅来说还是太遥远了一些，我们还是找一个靠谱的理想奋斗吧~
Uh... well... this ideal is still a bit too far-fetched for you, Bronya. Let's find a more realistic ideal to strive for~
